description: The Federal Judicial Affairs Canada (FJA) and the Canadian Judicial Council (CJC) have a requirement for translation services on an as and when needed basis.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
#### Administrative and Judicial Translation Services

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-6442-8319297
* **Publication Date:** 2023-06-14
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-12T17:00:00
* **Contract Start Date:** 2023-08-14
* **Contract End Date:** 2028-07-31

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Administrative and Judicial Translation Services. The Office of the Commissioner for Federal Judicial Affairs Canada (FJAC) and the Canadian Judicial Council (CJC) require high-quality translation services in the following categories:

#### Category A: English to French and French to English Administrative Translation

* Estimated yearly volume: 200,000 words
* Approximate 90% of the language requirements are English to French

#### Category B: English to French and French to English Judicial Translation

* Estimated yearly volume: 200,000 words
* Approximate 85% of the language requirements are English to French

Translation services will be required primarily for the translation of headnotes, captions, and digests in the Federal Courts Reports, an official publication of the FJAC. The estimated start date of the Standing Offer is July 2023.

#### Contract Term
The contract will be awarded for a minimum of two years, with three one-year irrevocable options to extend the term. The estimated contract end date is July 2028.

#### Tender Documents

You can download the tender documents from the following links:

* [Question and Answer (Q&A)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6442/fja-rfso-2023-001-qa-en-fr.pdf)
* [Translation Services - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6442/fja-rfso-2023-001-translation-en.pdf)
* [Translation Services - French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6442/fja-rfso-2023-001-translation-fr.pdf)

For more information, please contact Daniel Morin at FJA.Admin@fja-cmf.gc.ca or (613) 947-6339.
